syAqditi# saMtaqrAM tasya# paSuSIqrq.ShANyupa# daddhyAqt kanI#ya EqvAsyAnna#M Bavatiq yaM kAqmayE#ta saqmAva#daqsyAnna(gg)# syAqditi# maddhyaqtastasyOpa# daddhyAth saqmAva#-dEqvAsyAnna#M Bavatiq yaM kAqmayE#taq BUyOq&syA&nna(gg)# syAqdityantE#Shuq tasya# vyuqdUhyOpa# daddhyAdantaqta EqvAsmAq annaqmava# rundhEq BUyOq&syAnna#M Bavati ( ) || 42 
(Eqnaq- maqsyAnnaqM - BUyOq&syA&nna#M Bavati) (A10)
